General.Name: Ningbo Gaofa Automotive Ctrl
General.Description: Ningbo Gaofa Automotive Control System Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and operates automotive control products in China. The company offers variable speed control systems, electronic accelerator pedals, electronic gear shifters, and automotive controllers and cables. It supplies its products to automotive industry. Ningbo Gaofa Automotive Control System Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No. 717, Xiaying North Road, Ningbo, China, 315105
